title: Set Up a Promotional Display
description: An associate needs to set up a promotional end-cap display for a new product launch.

tasks.description: Find the instructions for the new promotional display in the task management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate finds the task which includes a picture and instructions.

tasks.description: Gather the necessary product and signage from the backroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate collects all materials needed for the display.

tasks.description: Assemble the display at the designated end-cap location according to the instructions and mark the task as complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The promotional display is correctly set up to attract customers.
